kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://rocklov-api-gama.fly.dev/signup path_url=/signup headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '74', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Tony Stark", "email": "debra14@yahoo.com", "password": "pwd123"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
